00018 #ifndef __VAVERAGE_H
00019 #define __VAVERAGE_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/paircalculator.h>
00022 
00023 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00024 
00043 class Vaverage : public PairCalculator
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     Vaverage() {}
00047     ~Vaverage() {}
00048 
00049     const char *Description() { return "Average charge velocity, mobility along the field, and site current"; }
00050 
00051     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00052     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00053     void EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair);
00054     void EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top);
00055 
00056 protected:
00057     bool _do_mobility;
00058     vec _E;
00059     vec _v;
00060     int _nframes;
00061     map <QMCrgUnit *, vec> _symmetrized_current;
00062     map <QMCrgUnit *, vec> _forward_current;
00063 
00064 };
00065 
00066 inline void Vaverage::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options) {
00067     _do_mobility = false;
00068     _nframes = 0;
00069 
00070     if (options->exists("options.vaverage.mobility"))
00071         _do_mobility = options->get("options.vaverage.mobility").as<bool > ();
00072 
00073     if (_do_mobility)
00074         _E = options->get("options.calc_rates.e_field").as<vec > ();
00075     _v = vec(0,0,0);
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool Vaverage::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top)
00079 {
00080     PairCalculator::EvaluateFrame(top);
00081     _nframes++;
00082     return true;
00083 }
00084 
00086 inline void Vaverage::EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair)
00087 {
00088     QMCrgUnit *crg1 = pair->first;
00089     QMCrgUnit *crg2 = pair->second;
00090 
00091     double p1 = crg1->getOccupationProbability();
00092     double p2 = crg2->getOccupationProbability();
00093 
00094     double w12 = pair->rate12();
00095     double w21 = pair->rate21();
00096     vec r = unit<nm,m>::to(pair->r());
00097 
00098     _v+=(w12*p1 - w21*p2)*r;
00099     //cout << crg1->getOccupationProbability() << "\t" << crg2->getOccupationProbability() << "\t" << pair->rate12() <<  "\t" << pair->rate21() << "\t" <<(pair->rate12()*crg1->getOccupationProbability() - pair->rate21()*crg2->getOccupationProbability())*pair->r() << endl;
00100 
00101     _symmetrized_current[crg1] += 0.5 * (p2 * w21 - p1 * w12) * r;
00102     _symmetrized_current[crg2] += 0.5 * (p2 * w21 - p1 * w12) * r;
00103 
00104     if (r.getX() > 0.0) {
00105         _forward_current[crg1].setX(_forward_current[crg1].getX() + (p2 * w21 + p1 * w12) * r.getX());
00106     }
00107     else {
00108         _forward_current[crg2].setX(_forward_current[crg2].getX() - (p2 * w21 + p1 * w12) * r.getX());
00109     }
00110 
00111     if (r.getY() > 0.0) {
00112         _forward_current[crg1].setY(_forward_current[crg1].getY() + (p2 * w21 + p1 * w12) * r.getY());
00113     }
00114     else {
00115         _forward_current[crg2].setY(_forward_current[crg2].getY() - (p2 * w21 + p1 * w12) * r.getY());
00116     }
00117 
00118     if (r.getZ() > 0.0) {
00119         _forward_current[crg1].setZ(_forward_current[crg1].getZ() + (p2 * w21 + p1 * w12) * r.getZ());
00120     }
00121     else {
00122         _forward_current[crg2].setZ(_forward_current[crg2].getZ() - (p2 * w21 + p1 * w12) * r.getZ());
00123     }
00124 }
00125 
00127 void Vaverage::EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top)
00128 {
00129     vector<QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00130     vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator itl;
00131 
00132     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl != lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00133       cout <<  (*itl)->getId() << "\t" 
00134            << (*itl)->GetCom()<< "\t" 
00135            << _symmetrized_current[(*itl)] / _nframes << "\t" 
00136            << _forward_current[(*itl)] / _nframes << endl;
00137     }
00138 
00139     cout << "Average velocity [m/s]: " << _v / _nframes << endl;
00140     if(_do_mobility)
00141        cout << "Average mobility [cm^2/Vs]: " << _v*_E/(_E*_E)*1E4 / _nframes << endl;
00142     
00143 }
00144 
00145 }}
